DOC.detailed_description: There many pregnant woman require medical intervention induce labor reason term . There two fundamental change characterize pre-labor preparation delivery : sensitization myometrium produce contraction , ripen ( soften dilation ) cervix . A synthetic Prostaglandin misoprostol fundamental change . Low dose misoprostol effective safe labor induction use widely . Oral tablet ( 200mcg ) broken fragment use intravaginally ripen cervix induce labor due disadvantage exist cervical ripeners ( delivery bolus dos , freezer refrigerate storage , lack efficacy labor induction ) , due safety concern off-label use oral misoprostol tablet fragment , Regenex Corporation develop vaginal tablet 25mcg misoprostol . The primary objective study assess efficacy safety low dose ( 25 mcg ) misoprostol vaginal tablet cervical ripen induction labour .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy . Aged 20 year old . At term ( 37 42 week inclusive gestation ) . Cephalic presentation ( normal lie ) . No rupture . Bishop score â‰¤6 . With indication labour induction . Written informed consent . Any contraindication vaginal delivery . Previous uterine scar ( Cesarean section uterine surgery ) . Heavy repeat vaginal bleeding third trimester pregnancy . Have history glaucoma , asthma epilepsy . Contraindication prostaglandin use . Known severe allergy prostaglandin .
